result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:05 AM Defendant Tommy J Wesoloski in court.  Prosecuting attorney Kyle Olsen in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has not retained counsel, requested adjournment. No objection by State.
Status conference scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 01:40 pm.
Status conference on December 5, 2022 at 01:40 pm.

1:45 PM Defendant Tommy J Wesoloski in court.  Attorney Benjamin Wagner in court for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was denied for SPD, but has now lost his job and is going to reapply today. He was also given information regarding a court appointed attorney if he is denied again.
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on October 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on September 26, 2022 at 01:40 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 14

03:53 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Will Rice Anderson.  Tomas Fernando Valerio appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 01:40 pm.
